template.template: RR Mikrotik - BGP - Beta Test SSH
template.name: RR Mikrotik - BGP - Beta Test SSH
template.description: Exige conexão SSH By Rudimar Remontti

discovery_rule.name: BGP - Peers
discovery_rule.params: :global list [/routing bgp peer find]; :global count 0; :global total [:len $list]; :put "{\"data\":["; :foreach i in=$list do={; :set count ($count + 1); :local name [/routing bgp peer get value-name=name number=$i]; :local remoteas [/routing bgp peer get value-name=remote-as number=$i]; :local disabled [/routing bgp peer get value-name=disabled number=$i]; :if ( $count < $total) do={; :put "{\"{#PEERNAME}\":\"$name\",\"{#REMOTEAS}\":\"$remoteas\",\"{#DISABLED}\":\"$disabled\"},"; } else={; :put "{\"{#PEERNAME}\":\"$name\",\"{#REMOTEAS}\":\"$remoteas\",\"{#DISABLED}\":\"$disabled\"}"; }; }; :put "]}";

trigger_prototype.name: Interface {#IFNAME} - {#IFALIAS} : Sinal TX Está acima de -26dBm
Interface {#IFNAME} - {#IFALIAS} : Sinal RX Está acima de -27dBm

trigger_prototype.expression: {RR Mikrotik SNMP SFP Infos:sfp.[rx.{#IFNAME}].change()}>-2 or {RR Mikrotik SNMP SFP Infos:interface.[tx.{#IFNAME}].change()}>-2

trigger.expression: {RR Mikrotik SNMP Info Geral:mk.memoria.usada.last()} *100 / {RR Mikrotik SNMP Info Geral:mk.memoria.total.last()} > 85
trigger.name: Pouca memória

trigger.expression: {RR Mikrotik SNMP Info Geral:mk.hdd.usada.last()} *100 / {RR Mikrotik SNMP Info Geral:mk.hdd.total.last()} > 80
trigger.name: Pouco espaço
